item.description: David McClellan IT Professional, software developer (and I write sometimes…) based in Bristol, Vermont Email / Website / LinkedIn / GitHub / Twitter üë®‚Äçüíª Technical Experience IT Manager @ Mountain Health Center (September 2019 - Present) A Federally Qualified Health Center - Serving the community across multiple avenues of health. Wrote a custom CLI email client for Office 365 Automated workflow with PowerShell, Python, and Go to improve efficiency in day to day tasks Maintained and migrated to Active Directory 2016 from 2008 R2 Designed, purchased, configured, and installed UniFi networking hardware Designed, hardened, and installed Fortigate firewalls Performed system maintenance, upgrades, and improvements on Windows Server 2016/2019 and MSSQL tuning Designed and implemented multiple Linux (Ubuntu) servers for IT Services use.
